289993178 发表于 2015-2-11 09:10
樓主求光影和材質包
光影是俢改過的 SEUS v10.1 Ultra
http://tieba.baidu.com/p/3490650153 (下載在48樓)

材質/資源包是 MrShortee's Bladecraft x64 Cyberpunk Resource Pack
http://www.planetminecraft.com/t ... punk-resource-pack/
網站可能要先輸入驗證碼
